Text:
Splendid. I have been looking forward to this one.
- This movie became the runner up as the Norwegian contender to the Oscars 2011, for best Foreign Language Film.
tack men jag står bara inte ut med inbrända subs, varför???

please do not burn subtitles in the movie, better to put external subs (.srt or idx/sub) so we can use w/e subtitles we want (english, french, german, spanish, chinese...) :p

also, why two files and not a big 2000Mo file? 
old scene rules is plain silly today with adsl...

thank you!
Enig AnotherStranger. Brente SUBS er totalt steinalder. Ellers takk.
